Name:
USS Barnes
HMS Attacker
Fate:
Sold into Merchant service February 1947
returned to the USN 1946
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (USA)
Attacker-class escort carrier (UK)
Armament:
2 × 4 inch Mk V dual purpose guns in single mounts
8 × 40 mm Bofors AA guns in twin mounts
21 × 20 mm Oerlikon cannons in single and twin mounts
